name: StarFoxCV
description:
A prototype made for learning based on Star Fox games.

You can fire lasers, charge an aimed laser, fire bombs and aimed bombs, boost, brake, sommersault, BARREL ROLLS, and BULLET TIME.

Laser -> Cross / A

Bombs -> Square / X

Boost -> Right Trigger

Brake -> Left Trigger

Sommersault -> Joystick down + Right Trigger

Lean Left/Right -> L1/R1 // LB/RB  ( Barrel Roll ->press Twice)

To bullet time, press EAST gamepad button (Circle / B). You have to defeat enemies to recharge it.

The game consists in only one level, boss included.

When the boss is defeated, the game is ended.
